tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went there for my mother's dental issues. Doctor advised us on how to go about removal, implants, RCT.  While he was very clear on his advice, he also told us other possible options and why not to choose them. The entire process took more than 4 months, but it was most satisfying as Dr was very helpful. My mother was extremely happy as she didn't experience any pain, unlike her previous expierence with other Doctors* * ***** ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* *** *** ** ** *** *** ****** **** **** * ****** *******

tags: None
review: Dr Gaba was referred to us by a friend. We had gone for my 3 year old daughter for cavity check up and filling. Dr Gaba was very patient and tactful with the child. He completed the fillings painlessly and with no resistance from the child. He kept talking to my child during the entire procedure and took special efforts to ensure that she felt comfortable. He is very friendly and explains all dental concepts to the satisfaction of patients. I would recommend him highly in my circle, especially with kids where patience and tact are as important as skill.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Implant Fixing,
review: Dr Girish makes it a point to explain the entire issue to the patient and is extremely good with the way he handles the problem. A visit to a dentist never seemed pleasant to me till the time I visited him. **** *** ** *** **** ******** * **** **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extremely patient doctor. He gave me all possible solutions to the problem my child had and also his recommendation. Didn't try and influence my decision. Also, gave me time to think over the best possible solution to go in for. He was very good at handling the anxiety of my child and did a perfect job. I would highly recommend him for dental issues.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I visited Dr Girish Gaba for my veneer treatment, I was very happy by his friendly behavior it made me feel comfortable & mostly by the way he explained me about what treatment I'm gonna be getting done from him & it's effects. 
Also his work was very neat & not very time consuming, I was satisfied with the treatment I received at his clinic!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Gaba has a very warm and comforting bedside manner. Allied with his expert hands, he makes the treatment as painless as possible which also gives the patient a lot of comfort. Will definitely visit once more and would suggest him to anyone who needs a quality dentist

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Although it was my very first time at a dentist, I must say my experience was very very nice. Dr Girsh not only explained in detail the issue and procedure but was also very professional. 

I would certainly not hesitate to recommend his name for any dental issues which need treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Girish Gaba is not only sweet and friendly but also very professional.
So many queries I had in mind... From shifting to a new dentist to putting the kind of cap on my tooth. He calmly explained all dental theories in a common man's language so that I could understand and solved all my queries.
Five shining stars to the welcoming and amiable attitude.
